website_summaries.verdict: Its ability to withstand both extreme heat and water is impressive, and this model’s zipper and hook loop closures do more to protect documents than many other models would.
pros: Sports two closings to double-protect documents
cons: The bag has a strong chemical smell at first, but it dissipates over time

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I have survived two household fires wherein both times the houses were reduced to rubble. There is always the hassle of trying to prove who you are to the agencies and whatnot. With this, I've got all my important documents, emergency cash and contact list in ONE fire resistant easy to grab and go place. To say I wished I had this years ago is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Trust
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this envelop 5-Stars because it comes so highly recommended. One cannot know whether something like this will actually work. I trust it will. Also, Murphy's Law says that if you prepare, it never happens, so, there's that.. The science and the company's reputation are impressive, and I have applied the directions religiously. What you CAN depend on, is me letting you know, regardless of its performance. As of now, I'm trusting some precious original documents which would otherwise be irretrievable.
customer_reviews.author: Secundus Tacitus

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had put it off because I thought I need a bulky box but this pouch does not take up much more room than the photos and all did. It is well made and now I have as much peace of mind about their safety as I can have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a strong bag. Looks like it will last a long time. I like the fact that it closes with a zipper and then it has a strong velcro flap. I will recomend this product to family and friends. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive insurance.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually much nicer in person than I expected. I don't know how well it will hold up in a fire, but I did place some blank paper inside and ran water over the bag. No leaks found in my testing. I use this item inside a fire safe for additional protection.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Seems very well made
customer_reviews.text: Just got this. Using it to store some collectable, graded comic books I collect. Seems very sturdy and well made. I hope I never have to test it out, but peace of mind is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love the zipper/Velcro combination, really secures documents. Made of high quality material able to withstand a fire.
customer_reviews.author: M. Z. R.

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not protecting the documents from fire I order 3 burning test one all documents inside was also burned
customer_reviews.author: pon

customer_reviews.title: Low-cost peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say if this is truly fireproof, since it has never been in a fire. However, the construction seems top-notch, and I like the zipper under the Velcro enclosure for added sealing protection. The size is also great for documents or even a box of checks. I originally wanted to get a fireproof safe, but this option meets my needs at a much, much lower price. My simple docs don't need security... just protection if a fire occurs.
customer_reviews.author: MusicPDX

customer_reviews.title: poor craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: Had this item for only a few months and it's coming apart at the seams. I did not handle the bag very much. Just kept a few items in it and opened it a few times each week.
customer_reviews.author: n/a

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 14 of these to give as gifts with a special flash drive that contained a family project. The materials and workmanship are very good. I didn't give them 5 stars because of the size of the bag....they don't expand much and so the volume is limited, but ok for this project.
customer_reviews.author: spole1958

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: After going through h*ll replacing some important papers from a name change with the government, I decided I wasn’t taking any chances with our family’s paperwork. I ordered this and like it. It’s sturdy, the zipper and the Velcro make it secure (really secure, that Velcro doesn’t mess around) and it’s a great size. It hasn’t been through a fire or a flood (knock on wood), so I can’t rate it on that and hopefully won’t ever have to.
customer_reviews.author: MayBae

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a big safe, but it’s not fireproof. I figured this was just what I needed to keep documents like marriage license, passports, vehicle titles and spare cash in while stores inside my safe. Saves me from buying a fireproof safe in the meantime! The material is very heavy duty feeling and has a shiny metallic liner inside. There is an extremely strong Velcro flap that seals over the top of a heavy duty zipper. I’m not going to throw this thing in fire to test, so I sure hope it works!
customer_reviews.author: -Dan-

customer_reviews.title: Only Time and Unhoped for Disaster Will Tell
customer_reviews.text: How can you review something that you purchased to protect you from disaster if it comes and won't know if it works unless that disaster, that you want to avoid, actually occurs. All you can do is trust the description that this item will protect your valuables and has been tested as claimed. I bought it on that trust and their claimed testing. I hope I am never in the position to write a review that proves or disproves the fire protection claims. it looks like it should do what is claimed.
customer_reviews.author: FnS

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive and strong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three different document bags and this one is clearly the best. It has both a zipper and a fold-over velcro closing. The bag is fairly rigid, giving it the feel of quality. At 11" x 15" it easily holds a full-sized envelope full of documents. And the price is less than the other two I purchased. This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, right size and price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep very important documents together, ready to go out of the house in the event of flood or firer. It appears well made and will, I think, do the job better than you'd think from reading the listing. I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Victor S. Alpher

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Cant give a 5 star review simply because I didnt try setting it on fire. But it is very sturdy and good quality material. Perfect size for documents. Arrived on time. Fingers crossed I wont ever need to test it out.
customer_reviews.author: raimonator2

customer_reviews.title: STURDY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: The product met my expectations. It has a sturdy zipper and velcro closure. We were able to fit quite a few documents in it without it bulging out of shape. I have not had a fire (thankfully) so I can't attest to it's ability to protect documents in a fire. But I am satisfied with the good quality of the product. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd4ASL

customer_reviews.title: Sure why not
customer_reviews.text: I thought this folder would expand just a little more, but overall a great product. I don’t know how well this will hold up during a disaster (and honestly, not in a hurry to find out ha).
customer_reviews.author: Juicycelebrity

customer_reviews.title: will not hold a lot
customer_reviews.text: The bag does not hold many documents. It is not roomy. Otherwise it seems to be sturdy. I cannot vouch for reliability in a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Jane D Klenk

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's good and compact.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, compact and flat. Has a zipper and fold over cuff, but I think water and smoke could get in there but not too easily. I'm happy with it. I have it in my fireproof safe.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Feels Safe and Secure
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased other fireproof bags and this one is my preferred. This one feels secure. I like the zipper and velcro combination. The size is a good shape and amount. Will purchase this one again if I need more.
customer_reviews.author: R Ten

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something that can conceal and protect valuables and this product meets the storage function, hope never have to test fire protective functionality
customer_reviews.author: DIYrebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 4/5 because I have no idea if they will actually be okay in a fire. But I don’t want to learn the hard way if you know what I mean! They are build very well and have a strong zipper
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The zipper and Velcro seal the pouch very well
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to prove or disprove the fire resistant ability of this product. A Manila size and envelop will fit into this pouch. I personally would have liked if it was a little deeper it actually is so I could fit more documents.
customer_reviews.author: pataylor1953

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Finally i no longer have to fear my documents being burned by godzilla. That dastardly lizard has burned 12 of my precious papers. It all began in 1987 when I accidentally forged his signature on some death certificates to collect his life insurance and now everytime I get a new birth certificate he burns it. But not with the fire proof folder.
customer_reviews.author: ross richards

customer_reviews.title: Do not love
customer_reviews.text: The bag has a terrible smell to it. Seems flimsy like it will not protect items. I will give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Goodness gracious great envelope of fire
customer_reviews.text: Great set on fire with my birth certificate inside to test thank God it works
customer_reviews.author: Laurie C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: Interesting bag design. The only thing I didn't understand is that this bag doesn't fit comfortably in the carry case. In stead of paying attention to the dimensions of both i assumed this bag would slip into the carry bag. However it will work by folding this bag in half. Extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Holds approx. 1&1/2" thick of 8x11 paperwork in 6 folders. I don't have a fireproof safe...only have a burglar and fire resistant safe. So I use this to protect the docs within the safe. Tried one at first... was impressed and got another one.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN A HERTZ

customer_reviews.title: will it survive?
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to rate this because Until it undergoes severe water and or fire exposure, we really won't know how it does. so will let you know,but hopefully I won't have to lolololol
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Leech

customer_reviews.title: I hope it works!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I haven’t had a fire so I can’t attest to the claim that it’s fireproof. But I do live in California so more likely than not, I will be a victim of a wildfire some day and hopefully this does what it says it does. Visually, it’s good. Financially, it’s well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Bren Fig

customer_reviews.title: Relieved my important stuff is in one safe spot.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have one of these in your home. Imperative to keep your documents safe. Very small price to pay in the end. It doesn’t take up much space and it’s a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: While this hasn't gone through a fire, the quality and feel of the bag is good. The zipper and Velcro seem pretty "heavy duty." The seller delivered the product as promised. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ADJ

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My house hasn’t burned down, so if it does I’ll write another review and let you know if the contents survived. I really hope that doesn’t happen though.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, seals fully, versatile, well priced!
customer_reviews.text: Fits multiple 8.5x11 documents. Zippers shut as well as strong velcro closure. We needed small, sturdy, safe document storage and thus is a great product for that.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very durable I love the way it’s made. I bought just to store important family documents and was very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: ashmarie

customer_reviews.title: Good for fire or water proofing a couple sheets of paper.
customer_reviews.text: Glad the product is fireproof and waterproof, very good closures. I wish it would hold more, cant fit a manilla envelope into it and not many papers so I personally would need a bigger one. There is not much space inside.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie J

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the velcro seal.
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made I hope I never have to test it's protective abilities but I believe it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pauly Wally

customer_reviews.title: What l was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be what l was looking for. The bag feels durable, and it zips closed and has a velcro flap that covers the zipper. I haven't tried to light it on fire, so I can't speak to it's performance when burned.
customer_reviews.author: Tap-Rack-Bang

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I keep all my important paperwork birth certificates, marriage licenses, social, cash, credit cards, family pictures, vechile title or pink slip safe and ready when disaster strikes. Try to be ready for the unexpected
customer_reviews.author: Freddie C.

customer_reviews.title: Not so much space
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back bc the Velcro was so strong I couldn’t get it open easily and I needed to put documents in and out.
customer_reviews.author: august

customer_reviews.title: Very thin layers, quality not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the quality: thin layers and weak flap fastener. I have serious doubts this will protect anything inside.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazr

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I return it only because it's too big for my safe. Other then that it's made with good quality material
customer_reviews.author: Yassine

customer_reviews.title: Love my water and fire proof document bag.
customer_reviews.text: i wanted something that was water and fire proof. We went through Harricane Michael and were very blessed that we didn't have much damage. we are coming up on harricane season again and I wanted to be prepared if another cat 5 harricane hits us again. I think the document bag is just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, Video Demo Sold Me
customer_reviews.text: In haven’t tested this is an actual fire, but the video to demonstrate the fire resistance of this bag sold me on it. It is well made and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: well constructed
customer_reviews.text: well constructed & sturdy. zippers work. the sizes work well with what I want to protect.
customer_reviews.author: Rose R.

customer_reviews.title: No fire yet, but the bag seems like it will work
customer_reviews.text: The bag is sturdy, made of good materials, and a great size for personal documents and passport.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Arends

customer_reviews.title: Appears solid
customer_reviews.text: The product seems well made, appears to close securely, however as mine has not been through a fire it is difficult to judge how the product actually delivers on the claims.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Document Protection
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything I thought it would be and more. It is very sturdy and can hold a large amount of paperwork and etc. It is a few inches longer than most documents, so it fits them well and they are further away from the seam, making them feel more secure. Would recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought it! Feels and looks durable to keep important documents safe!
customer_reviews.author: C. Banuelos

customer_reviews.title: Fireproof Money & Doc Bag
customer_reviews.text: Well made bag. I keep my documents in this bag inside my home safe.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Bag has permanent creases
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it will do the job but has ugly creases in it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Rockford

customer_reviews.title: 1/4" too  narrow
customer_reviews.text: Seems great, but it's difficult to slide documents in and out of. Could use just a little more width so things don't get stuck on various seals and lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for peace of mind. It closes securely and is a bit larger than I expected. It's a quality product, and I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I was worried if it would be reliable when I ordered it, but it seems my worries were unfounded.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa White

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great, have not experience all the features and i hope i don't. Im sure it is fire resistance by the built of it.
customer_reviews.author: OSCAR  CORTES  JR,

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pouch
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of the pouch material and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They're sturdy, water resistant, and seems like they'll last a long time. Hopefully, I actually NEVER have to test them!)
customer_reviews.author: Cole Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I Love this
customer_reviews.text: havent been able to actually test it out... Thank God! but i feel as if my paper valuables are protected
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Zipper and velcro closure, can fit a good amount in
customer_reviews.author: Haley Faro

customer_reviews.title: Can't Tell You How Well it Works Unless My House Burns Down
customer_reviews.text: But I give 5 stars for the concept. Hopefully our docs are safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kyahn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Plenty of room for documents, certificates, diplomas, checks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and it's cheap!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little stiff but it's ok, it protects stuff inside well! It's not expensive and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Bisayang Dako

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This holds my important documents perfectly. I just hope I do not have any fires to prove it works, but at least I have something than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Nice and roomy. And unlike a safe you can take it with you on vacation, trips Etc to keep all of your money, passport, documents protected and in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase, I think.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it would stand up to a lot of damage. Feel better with it than without it.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy shopper guy

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a great product but I guess I would know unless something bad happens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: only work under a mild fire 🔥.....
customer_reviews.text: I try it w fire 🔥 and the outside of the bag burn completely but the stuff inside was fine
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: The product looks like it meets all the descriptions features as it was advertised. The only thing I would do differently is purchase the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: D K.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t know for sure until there is a fire
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money! Nice size for all your important documents.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for titles
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Perfect for titles, passports, gun registrations, legal documents. .
customer_reviews.author: Annie W.

customer_reviews.title: Hot stuff
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tested it. Hope I never have to. Seems well built and roomy though.
customer_reviews.author: TJL

customer_reviews.title: A good size and holds my documents well
customer_reviews.text: A good size and holds my documents well. I am unsure of the fire proof as it has not seen a fire yet haha.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works
customer_reviews.text: Still not sure if it's fireproof.Unwilling to try, very handy to have, great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel mohler

customer_reviews.title: They seem very high quality and nicely made with a strong zipper at the top
customer_reviews.text: They seem very high quality and nicely made with a strong zipper at the top. Hopefully, I don't have test them out. Same size as a manila envelope.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: feels sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: i like the velcro + zipper combo makes me feel like my valuables are safe.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: It was the right size, sturdy yet very flexible and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Zane47

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Made of extreme high quality fabric. Perfect for holding documents, jewelry and much more. Very spacious. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CCgirll

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: It’s bigger than I expected and quite heavy. I suppose that’s a good thing though as it will make documents safer.
customer_reviews.author: TeachU

customer_reviews.title: Great product looks very durable obviously haven't tested it and hopefully will not have to. Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product to store some important documents.
customer_reviews.author: rami kabota

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: It's very roomy, very well made. Hope I never have to use it for what it's purpose is.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what I needed and hoped for to store my important stuff.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Norris

customer_reviews.title: fire/water proof
customer_reviews.text: cant vouch for a fire but great size. holds a lot of important papers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty with Zipper and Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I like the thickness, and weight of this well made bag. Strong Velcro closure and zipper. Great for documents, cash, photos and small thin items. The size and that it lays flat is helpful to easily hide it as opposed to a bulky fire safe, which I also own and which is obvious to see. I'm concerned with the chances of my safe being broken or stolen than it being in a fire. I thankfully haven't eve had a fire to officially test out it's heat claims, but do feel more secure using this bag for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Larkhall

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy. Documents fit well inside of it. Hope to never use it
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Nice safety bag
customer_reviews.text: As securing your information and making sure it is safe is concerned, you can never be too careful. This fireproof bag is a nice size and does what it promises. All your important papers and money can be stored and kept safe. The bag looks nice too...
customer_reviews.author: word consumer

customer_reviews.title: Letter size Bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. A great place to store my important documents.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara I. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be great. Solid structural integrity, Haven't tested it in fire tho.
customer_reviews.author: Yossi Berger

customer_reviews.title: Good fire bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits a lot and has a zipper. Nice for the price
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a quality product, hopefully I will never have to find out if it is fireproof.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had more depth to be able to keep more papers!
customer_reviews.author: Fari

customer_reviews.title: Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Quality item. Takes some strength to un-velcro. Hope to never find out how fireproof they are.

customer_reviews.title: Happy for the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like them because I use them for my house paperwork and my documents. I was happy with the product and would recommend it for any of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Jasper

customer_reviews.title: This is water AND fire proof! The size makes it so easy to store in confined spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my valuable documents. And the size was so much more efficient than a traditional lock box.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Fits a few items I want to protect a little bit more. Shipping was fast.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product just wish it could be more roomier
customer_reviews.author: Mostafa Hussein

customer_reviews.title: Bigger Than expected
customer_reviews.text: Good size and feels durable. I hope it works should there be a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Fod

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good for what it is. I don’t know if it’s actuallh fire proof- and I hope never to find out!
customer_reviews.author: Shadayo

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, but makes my hand itchy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a roomy bag to fit a lot documents. It looks like it will protect very good. But it makes my skin very itchy when it came in contact with the fiberglass lining in the inside. I had to wish my hand with soap and use anti-itch cream.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Fireproof Money & Document Bag, MoKo 15" x 11" Fire & Water Resistant Cash & Envelope Holder, Protect Your Valuables, Documents, Money, Jewelry, Zipper Closure for Maximum Protection, Black
feature_bullets: FIRE PROOF & WATER RESISTANT - Made of high quality Silicone Coated Retardant-fiberglass exterior and aluminum foil interior, which can withstand temperatures as high as 1000°C (about 1832°F), so you can keep all your valuables 100% safe.
LARGE CAPACITY - With a large capacity of expanded demension 15" x 11", you can put many valuables in it, such as cash, jewelry, passports, documents, tablets, photos, Li-Po Battery, etc. and so on.

ZIPPER & HOOK & LOOP CLOSURE, DOUBLE PROTECTION - Unlike other fireproof bag, our fireprooof bag features with a zipper plus HOOK & LOOP closure design, provides you double security and maximum protection.
COMPACT AND FOLDABLE, CONVENIENT TO USE - A convenient accessory for you no matter at home or on office, portable and can be easily folded, you can use it anytime and anywhere.
Material: Fiberglass + Aluminum Foil. Expanded Dimension: 15" x 11"(38cm x 28cm).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars975 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
